title: Cursed Sapling
summaries: The Cursed Sapling item is used to summon the Cursed Sapling pet, the item itself drops from the Mourning Wood in the Pumpkin Moon event.
The pet appears as a small dark blue tree stump with a jagged head, a jack-o-lantern face, and roots which it walks on.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a cursed sapling to follow you
statistics.Sell: 2
